DOC.criteria: Diagnosis trigeminal autonomic cephalalgia accord International Headache Classification include episodic cluster headache , chronic cluster headache , episodic paroxysmal hemicrania , chronic paroxysmal hemicrania , episodic shortlasting unilateral neuralgiform headache attack conjunctival injection tearing ( SUNCT ) , chronic SUNCT , episodic shortlasting unilateral neuralgiform headache attack cranial autonomic symptom ( SUNA ) , chronic SUNA , hemicrania continuum . OR Diagnosis trigeminal neuralgia accord International Headache Classification , include classical trigeminal neuralgia symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia .
